definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
echo/sound/noise/to make a sound/to sound/to ring/loud/classifier for noises

sentences.english: The triumphant orchestration inthe forth movement concludes the symphony in absolute victory.
sentences.chinese: 第四樂章的成功編曲是交響曲在絕對勝利中結束。

sentences.english: Dvorak also wrote a number of other symphonies and nine operas.
sentences.chinese: 德沃夏克還寫過許多其他的交響曲和九部歌劇。

sentences.english: Nature plays a harmonious symphony of sounds together in such regions.
sentences.chinese: 在這些地區大自然都在演奏和諧恢宏的交響曲。

sentences.english: He had actually written a couple of symphonies by this time.
sentences.chinese: 事實上他當時已經寫了兩部交響曲了。

sentences.english: This is his Symphony No.5 in B-flat so let's listen to this.
sentences.chinese: 我們要聽的來自他的降B大調第五交響曲。

sentences.english: Reduction of Symphony No. 9, for piano four hands.
sentences.chinese: 爲鋼琴四手聯彈而作的第9交響曲的縮編譜。

sentences.english: This movement is the most popular of Beethoven’s Symphony No. 7.
sentences.chinese: 這首樂章是貝多芬《第七號交響曲》中最受歡迎的。

sentences.english: He helped to accouche choral symphony.
sentences.chinese: 他曾幫助創作合唱交響曲。

sentences.english: He is a violoncellist in a symphony orchestra.
sentences.chinese: 樂隊演奏了一首莫扎特的交響曲。

sentences.english: I am looking for a record of Beethovens Sixth Symphony.
sentences.chinese: 我正在找貝多芬第六交響曲的唱片。

sentences.english: Reduction of Symphony No. 4, for two pianos.
sentences.chinese: 第4交響曲縮編譜，爲雙鋼琴而作。

sentences.english: A melody, a symphony, a life without our Canon in D.
sentences.chinese: 悅耳的音符，交響曲，和一個沒有卡農D調的生活。

sentences.english: Therefore, the last three symphonies are called "thespian trilogy".
sentences.chinese: 因此，後人也稱這後三部交響曲爲“悲劇三部曲”。

sentences.english: Next season it even plans to perform a Schumann symphony.
sentences.chinese: 奧菲斯甚至計劃在下一季度演奏舒曼的交響曲。

sentences.english: The tape recorder reproduced the symphony.
sentences.chinese: 錄音機可使這交響曲重現。

sentences.english: The fourth movement has a flavor of the final movement in Beethoven's 9th Symphony.
sentences.chinese: 第四樂章有貝多芬第九交響曲的味道。

definition: Haydn (name)/Franz Joseph Haydn (1732-1809), Austrian classical composer
Michelangelo Buonarroti (1475-1564), Renaissance painter and sculptor
